attributes.additional_details:
"How far you go in life should be based on your talent and how hard you work – and nothing else"

Black people has been marginalised in UK and the implementation of the recommendations of the Race Disparity Audit will address the majority of black people issues in this country
attributes.background:
Government to implement the recommendations of Race Disparity Audit

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/686071/Revised_RDA_report_March_2018.pdf
